item.title: Big Sister Cities: How They Are Related
item.description: Big Sister Cities is an interactive network graph showing 279 cities with more than 1 million inhabitants and how they are connected to their sister cities within this set.

item.title: Which Actors Appeared together in Spaghetti Western Films
item.description: This is an undirected graph of co-occurrences of actors who appeared in one or more Spaghetti Western films based on data from DBpedia retrieved on August 4, 2015.

item.title: Falcao and Iniesta the top players in 2013 according to Ronaldo and Messi
item.description: The Ballon d'Or 2013 visualization shows an interactive network graph of voters and voted football players related based on votes cast for the male FIFA Ballon d'Or award in 2013.

item.title: How npm Packages are Linked by Dependencies
item.description: 2 Interactive graph visualizations that show how npm packages are linked by dependency relations, the smaller one is limited to packages with at least 10 dependent packages. Graphs were pre-processed with Gephi and are rendered with sigma.js.

item.title: How Participants of the Visualisingdata Census are Connected on Twitter
item.description: The visualisingdata census network graph shows the Twitter connections of the participants of the 1st data visualization census initiated by Andy Kirk.

item.title: How Footballers Relate based on Google Searches
item.description: The footballers search relations visualization shows a network graph of former and current football players and managers related by Google searches with results containing knowledge graph information.

item.title: How Programmers Relate based on Google Searches
item.description: The programmers search relations visualization shows a network graph of programmers related by Google searches with results containing knowledge graph information.

item.title: Who Voted for Whom at Ballon d'Or 2012
item.description: The Ballon d'Or 2012 visualization shows an interactive network graph of voters and voted players related based on votes cast for the male FIFA Ballon d'Or award in 2012.

item.title: Relations of James Bond Film Actors based on Common Appearance
item.description: The James Bond Actors visualization is an interactive network graph showing the connections of actors who appeared together in 23 James Bond movies including the latest in the series called Skyfall.

item.title: A Network Graph of Human Diseases
item.description: The human disease network graph is a visualization based on a study that explored relations of diseases and human genes by Goh K-I, Cusick ME, Valle D, Childs B, Vidal M, Barabási A-L (2007).
